column5: Check this link if you like ice fishing https://www.sootoday.com/bold/video-goulais-bay-freezes-crystal-clear-for-the-first-time-in-recent-memory-3320149
Thats cool.. I've seen that on Lake Erie near crystal beach..
very cool. Would have liked to see more fish, but what you gonna do
It just did that in parry sound harbour. People are out skating, it’s really neat. Snowing today though so it’s gone now
Its just not something we ever see here. Always get snow with the ice so never clear like that. As far as fish, there are plenty but you gotta get a bit deeper.
